column2: TINDAKMALAYSIA NETWORK SERVICES PLT (TINDAK MALAYSIA)

Election Commission of Malaysia (SPR), Tindak Malaysia (2024), Attorney General Chambers, Berita Harian (https://www.bharian.com.my/berita/nasional/2020/06/702217/pertandingan-tiga-penjuru-di-prk-dun-chini)

This is the non-gazetted official results from SPR. Datuk Tengku Zainul Hisham is the former deputy division chief of Parti Pribumi Bersatu Malaysia (Bersatu). TindakMalaysia Network Services PLT is not responsible for any errors or omissions arising from the original data or its derivatives.
FIELD DESCRIPTION
Composite between Parliamentary Code,DUN Code, Polling District Code and Voting Channel Number

Parliamentary Name (2018 - present at the Created Date)

State Constituency (DUN) Name (2018 - present at the created Date)
Polling District Code (2018 - present at the Created Date)
Polling District Name (2018 - present at the Created Date)
Polling Centre for Chini By-Election 2020
Voting Channel Number (Nombor Saluran) for Chini By-Election 2020
Total number of ballot papers issued at the poll (as in A in all Form 14 + A in Form 15)
